title: RT60013: Physical Testing Of Rubbers - Quick Facts
text:
RT60013
Course name | PHYSICAL TESTING OF RUBBERS
Offered by | Rubber Technology Centre
Credits | 4
L-T-P | 4-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | {{{semester}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Tests on raw and compounded rubbers: plasticity, plasticity retention index, Plastimeters, Rotational viscometer, Mooney viscometer, Oscillating Disc rheometer, ODR and MDR 2000 etc. Extrusion plastimeter, Brabender Plastograph, Tack. Tackmeters, Shrinkage, Green strength, Processibility Testers. Tests on Vulcanized rubbers : Short-term stress-strain : tensile, compression
